full_summary:
**Canadian Government Tender Announcement:**
###Provide Tier 2 & 3 Infrastructure Snow & Ice Control Services for Rouge National Urban Park
#### tenderNumberDescription
This bid solicitation is for the provision of snowplowing and ice control services for Parks Canada's Tier 2 and 3 infrastructures at the Rouge National Urban Park. 
####Project Scope
The contact period is from the date of contract signing to March 31, 2024. The contract may be extended for an additional two years.
####Submission Requirements
*   Bids must be submitted via fax or email to the designated email address (soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca).
*   SAS Ariba is currently not an accepted tender submission method. Tenders sent by post or courier will not be accepted.
*   All inquiries must be submitted in writing and must be received a minimum of 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date.
####Notice/Disclaimer
The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers.
Parks Canada has taken every precaution to ensure that documents are available in both official languages. However, if any discrepancies are found, please notify the contracting officer promptly.

**Contracting Entity Information**
*   **Name:** Parks Canada 
*   **Postal Address:** PO Box 130, Rocky Harbour, NL A0K 4N0, Canada
*   **Date Publication:** November 10, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 20, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 27, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
#### Tender Information and Attachments
*   Tender Notice: [None Listed]
*   Document Files:

    []('https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24638/appendix-c--tier-3-location-maps-final-for-2023-2024.pdf'):https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24638/appendix-c--tier-3-location-maps-final-for-2023-2024.pdf
